  • pbftSecurityParam ∷ !SecurityParam
  • pbftNumNodes ∷ !NumCoreNodes
  • pbftSignatureThreshold ∷ !Double
}
name: PBftParams PBftParams pbftSecurityParam pbftNumNodes pbftSignatureThreshold

display_html:
data PBftIsLeader c = PBftIsLeader {
  • pbftCoreNodeId ∷ !CoreNodeId
  • pbftSignKey ∷ !(SignKeyDSIGN (PBftDSIGN c))
  • pbftDlgCert ∷ !(PBftDelegationCert c)
}
name: PBftIsLeader PBftIsLeader pbftSignKey pbftDlgCert pbftCoreNodeId

display_html:
data PBftIsLeaderOrNot c
  • = PBftIsALeader !(PBftIsLeader c)
  • | PBftIsNotALeader
name: PBftIsLeaderOrNot PBftIsALeader PBftIsNotALeader

display_html: pbftWindowSize ∷ SecurityParam → WindowSize
name: pbftWindowSize

display_html: forgePBftFields ∷ ∀ c toSign. (PBftCrypto c, Signable (PBftDSIGN c) toSign) ⇒ (VerKeyDSIGN (PBftDSIGN c) → ContextDSIGN (PBftDSIGN c)) → IsLeader (PBft c) → toSign → PBftFields c toSign
name: forgePBftFields

display_html:
class (Typeable c, DSIGNAlgorithm (PBftDSIGN c), Condense (SigDSIGN (PBftDSIGN c)), Show (PBftVerKeyHash c), Ord (PBftVerKeyHash c), Eq (PBftVerKeyHash c), Show (PBftVerKeyHash c), NoUnexpectedThunks (PBftVerKeyHash c), NoUnexpectedThunks (PBftDelegationCert c)) ⇒ PBftCrypto c where
  • type PBftDSIGN c ∷ ★
  • type PBftDelegationCert c = (d ∷ ★) | d → c
  • type PBftVerKeyHash c = (d ∷ ★) | d → c
  • dlgCertGenVerKey ∷ PBftDelegationCert c → VerKeyDSIGN (PBftDSIGN c)
  • dlgCertDlgVerKey ∷ PBftDelegationCert c → VerKeyDSIGN (PBftDSIGN c)
  • hashVerKey ∷ VerKeyDSIGN (PBftDSIGN c) → PBftVerKeyHash c
name: PBftCrypto PBftDSIGN PBftVerKeyHash PBftDelegationCert dlgCertGenVerKey dlgCertDlgVerKey hashVerKey

display_html: data PBftMockCrypto
name: PBftMockCrypto

display_html:
data PBftValidateView c
  • = Signable (PBftDSIGN c) signed ⇒ PBftValidateRegular SlotNo (PBftFields c signed) signed (ContextDSIGN (PBftDSIGN c))
  • | PBftValidateBoundary SlotNo HeaderHashBytes
name: PBftValidateView PBftValidateRegular PBftValidateBoundary

display_html: pbftValidateRegular ∷ (HasHeader hdr, SignedHeader hdr, Signable (PBftDSIGN c) (Signed hdr)) ⇒ ContextDSIGN (PBftDSIGN c) → (hdr → PBftFields c (Signed hdr)) → hdr → PBftValidateView c
name: pbftValidateRegular

display_html: pbftValidateBoundary ∷ ∀ hdr c. (HasHeader hdr, Serialise (HeaderHash hdr)) ⇒ hdr → PBftValidateView c
name: pbftValidateBoundary

display_html: data family ConsensusConfig p ∷ ★
name: ConsensusConfig PBftConfig pbftParams pbftIsLeader

display_html:
data PBftValidationErr c
  • = PBftInvalidSignature !Text
  • | PBftNotGenesisDelegate !(PBftVerKeyHash c) !(PBftLedgerView c)
  • | PBftExceededSignThreshold !(PBftVerKeyHash c) !Word64
  • | PBftInvalidSlot
name: PBftValidationErr PBftInvalidSignature PBftInvalidSlot PBftNotGenesisDelegate PBftExceededSignThreshold
